gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Kings 109, Magic 107
gameRecap.excerpt: Sacramento defeats Orlando, 109-107. For Sacramento, De'Aaron Fox led the way with 31 points, eight assists, and three steals while aided by Domantas Sabonis (21 points, 14 rebounds, eight assists) and Keegan Murray (22 points (six 3PM), seven rebounds, two blocks) in the victory. Jonathan Isaac tied a career-high with 25 points (three 3PM), seven rebounds, and two blocks with Paolo Banchero adding 22 points, 7 rebounds, and five assists for Orlando in the losing effort. Sacramento improves to 41-29, while Orlando moves to 42-29 and falls to the fifth seed in the loss.
